text: So Shimei rose, saddled his donkey, and went to Achish in Gath in search of his servants; and Shimei returned from Gath with his servants.
Eleasah became the father of Sismai. Sismai became the father of Shallum.
The Levites: descendants of Jeshua and Kadmiel, of the descendants of Hodaviah, seventy-four.
They said to one another, “If we all do as our kindred have done, and do not fight against the Gentiles for our lives and our laws, they will soon destroy us from the earth.”
There shall be a fourth kingdom, strong as iron; it shall break in pieces and subdue all these others, just as iron breaks in pieces and crushes everything else.
The child grew and became strong, filled with wisdom; and the favor of God was upon him. The Boy Jesus in the Temple.
He testified with many other arguments, and was exhorting them, “Save yourselves from this corrupt generation.”
